Core.EnableIDNA
TYPE: bool
DEFAULT: false
VERSION: 4.4.0
--DESCRIPTION--
Allows international domain names in URLs.  This configuration option
requires the PEAR Net_IDNA2 module to be installed.  It operates by
punycoding any internationalized host names for maximum portability.
--# vim: et sw=4 sts=4
